quiz.text: Recently (April 2023), the first National Conference of Heads of Anti-Narcotics Task Force of States and Union Territories has been held in New Delhi. The Government of India aims to build a drug- free India by _________.
options: 2030
2025
2035
2047
2040

quiz.text:
As per the paragraph, which of the following will fill in the place of __(X)__ and ___(Y)___?

A.      Ministry of Health & Family Welfare

B.      Ministry of Housing & Urban Affairs

C.      Ministry of Consumer Affairs, Food and Public Distribution
options: B and C
A and B
A and C
B only
None of the above

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to operationalizing 100 Food Streets to Promote Hygienic and Safe Food Practices?

A.      Financial assistance of Rs. 5 crore per Food Street to states/UTs.

B.      Assistance provided under National Health Mission in the ratio of 60:40 or 75: 25.

C.      Technical support provided by FSSAI.
options: A only
B only
B and C
A, B and C
C only

quiz.text: Recently (April 2023), the Union Minister of Housing and Urban Affairs while addressing Global Conference on Compressed Biogas (CBG) in New Delhi, has highlighted the need for domestic production of Gas. India has a target to increase the share of gas in the energy mix up to ________ by 2030 to make the country a Gas-based economy.
options: 10%
25%
50%
15%
30%

quiz.text: Recently (April 2023), the Union Minister for Jal Shakti has launched the Monitoring PRAYAG Platform at the 11th meeting of the Empowered Task Force (ETF) of National Mission for Clean Ganga (NMCG). What does ‘PRAYAG’ stand for?
options: Platform for Real-time Analysis of Yamuna, Ganga and their Tributaries
Platform for Real-time Analysis of Yamuna And Ganga
Portal for Real-time Analysis of Yamuna And Ganga
Portal for Real-time Analysis of Yamuna, Ganga and their Tributaries
None of the above

quiz.text:
Recently (April 2023), India and the UK held the second meeting of the India-UK Financial Markets Dialogue. Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with regards to the 2nd India-UK Financial Markets Dialogue?

A.      It was held in London.

B.      The Dialogue focused on four themes.

C.      A report titled ‘Harnessing the power of FinTech and data’ by India-UK Financial Partnership (IUKFP) was released during the event.
options: A and B
B and C
B only
C only
None of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following is not one of the themes of ‘Localization of SDG’?
options: Poverty free and enhanced livelihoods village.
Water sufficient village.
Wealthy village.
Child friendly village.
Self-sufficient infrastructure in village.

quiz.text: National Panchayat Awards have been given in which of the following categories?
options: Deen Dayal Upadhyay Panchayat Satat Vikas Puraskar
Nanaji Deshmukh Sarvottam Panchayat Satat Vikas Puraskar
Gram Urja Swaraj Vishesh Panchayat Puraskar
Carbon Neutral Vishesh Panchayat Puraskar
All of the above

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to GS NIRNAY?

A.      GS NIRNAY stands for National Initiative for Rural India to Navigate, InnovAte and Resolve PanchaYat.

B.      It is a mobile application of the Ministry of Rural Development aimed at empowering rural communities.

C.      It will bring more transparency and increase efficiency in the functioning of Panchayats.
options: A and C
C only
A and C
A only
A, B and C

quiz.text: Recently (April 2023), as per the information shared at the EU-India Aviation Summit, GST rates on MRO (Maintenance, Repair, and Overhaul) services have been reduced from _____ to _____.
options: 18%; 12%
12%; 5%
28%; 5%
28%; 18%
18%; 5%

quiz.text: Recently (April 2023), Culture Working Group (CWG) under India’s G20 Presidency, in association with __________ as the Knowledge Partner, has organized a Global Thematic Webinar on the “Promotion of Cultural and Creative Industries and Creative Economy”.
options: UNESCO
UNICEF
UNDP
OECD
World Bank

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with regards to Major Economies Forum (MEF) on Energy and Climate?
options: MEF was launched in 2016.
The group represents 20 major economies of the world.
India is represented in the group.
It aims to facilitate candid dialogue among major emitting countries.
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (April 2023), the G20 Research Innovation and Initiative Gathering (RIIG) Conference on Eco-Innovations for Energy Transition has been organized at which of the following places?
options: Chennai, Tamil Nadu
Guwahati, Assam
Bhopal, Madhya Pradesh
Dharamshala, Himachal Pradesh
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (April 2023), 'India Steel 2023', the 5th International Exhibition and Conference on Steel Industry has been held in Goregaon, Mumbai. It was organized by Ministry of Steel in association with ______________.
options: Department of Commerce, Union Ministry of Commerce and Industry
Federation of Indian Chambers of Commerce & Industry (FICCI)
Confederation of Indian Industry (CII)
1 and 2
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text: As per the paragraph, _________ has chaired the meeting of Heads of Departments of Shanghai Cooperation Organization (SCO) Member States responsible for Prevention and Elimination of Emergency Situations.
options: Prime Minister
Home Secretary
CBI Director
National Security Advisor (NSA)
Union Home Minister

quiz.text: Which of the following is not one of the countries having Observer Status with the SCO?
options: Mongolia
Bangladesh
Iran
Afghanistan
Belarus

quiz.text: According to recent data shared by the Ministry of Railways, Indian Railways has registered a record revenue of _____________ for 2022-23 (FY23) (25% growth compared to previous financial year).
options: Rs. 2.40 Lakh Crores
Rs. 1.40 Lakh Crores
Rs. 2.10 Lakh Crores
Rs. 1.80 Lakh Crores
Rs. 2.80 Lakh Crores

quiz.text: Recently (April 2023), the first Global Buddhist Summit has been hosted by Union Ministry of Culture, in collaboration with its grantee body International Buddhist Confederation (IBC) at New Delhi. Which of the following is/are the theme of the discussion at the summit?
options: Buddha Dhamma and Peace
Buddha Dhamma: Environmental Crisis, Health and Sustainability
Preservation of Nalanda Buddhist Tradition
Buddha Dhamma Pilgrimage, Living heritage and Buddha Relics.
All of the Above

quiz.text: Recently (April 2023), the National Highways Authority of India (NHAI) has announced a target to develop around __________ of Optic Fibre Cables (OFC) infrastructure (Digital Highways) across India by FY2024-25.
options: 5,000 km
50,000 km
10,000 km
75,000 km
1,00,000 km

quiz.text:
Recently (April 2023), Mission 50K-EV4ECO has been launched. Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with regards to Mission 50K-EV4ECO?

A.      It has been launched by State Bank of India.

B.      It aims to strengthen the EV ecosystem by direct and indirect lending.

C.      Loan will be given only for purchase of electric vehicle.
options: A and B
B and C
B only
A only
A and C

quiz.text: Recently (April 2023), ‘Sangathan se Samriddhi’ campaign has been launched by Ministry of Rural Development to empower which of the following groups of people?
options: Rural Farmers
Rural Women
Rural Youth
Girls of school going age
Construction workers

quiz.text: As per the paragraph, what will come in place ___(X)___?
options: USD 119.5 billion
USD 139.5 billion
USD 148.5 billion
USD 121.5 billion
None of the above

quiz.text: As per the paragraph, what will come in place ___(Y)___ and ___(Z)___ respectively?
options: increased; 1.5%
increased; 2.9%
decreased; 1.5%
decreased; 2.9%
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (April 2023), the Finance ministers from various Commonwealth countries have called for a systemic reform of the global financial architecture to enhance access to development financing for vulnerable countries. The ministers agreed for India to be the chair and ________ to be the deputy chair of the Finance Ministers Working Group for a Commonwealth Call for Reform of the Global Financial Architecture.
options: Nigeria
Indonesia
Brazil
South Africa
Denmark

quiz.text: Recently (April 2023), India has made a generous contribution of ____________ to the United Nations Entity for Gender Equality and the Empowerment of Women, also known as UN Women.
options: USD 500,000
USD 100,000
USD 250,000
USD 1 million
USD 5 million

quiz.text: Recently (April 2023), Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank (AIIB) has decided to open its first overseas office in which of the following countries?
options: India
Kenya
Indonesia
South Africa
UAE

quiz.text: As per recent (April 2023) news, India along with which of the following countries has/have announced a common platform for talks among creditors to address the debt restructuring programme of Sri Lanka which is grappling with its worst economic crisis?
options: Japan
France
USA
1 and 2
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text: Recently (April 2023), the Group of Seven (G7) Ministers’ Meeting on Climate, Energy and Environment was held in Sapporo, Japan. Which of the following countries is not part of G7?
options: Germany
Australia
Italy
France
Canada

quiz.text:
Recently (April 2023), researchers have Developed ‘Farm Distress Index’ to Identify Farmers in Need of Support. Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to Farm Distress Index?

A.      It has been developed by Central Research Institute for Dryland Agriculture.

B.      It is a part of World Bank funded project.

C.      It signals the imminent distress at least 3 to 4 months ahead.
options: A and B
B and C
A and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (April 2023), Union Bank of India, for the first time, has secured 1st rank as per the report on EASE Reforms Index for Q3 FY 2022-23. Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with regards to EASE Reforms Index?
options: EASE is an initiative by Department of Revenue, Ministry of Finance.
It was launched in 2018.
It is published by Indian Banks’ Association (IBA).
It is a part of the PSB Reforms Agenda, which is a part of EASENext reforms.
None of the above
